description: A cunning dragon known for his wisdom and strategic thinking.
secretNotes: It was in the 3D Art office, under the desk

description: A rare dragon with beautiful jade scales, rumored to bring good luck and fortune.
secretNotes: Secret location is in the cave of the forbidden mountain

description: A fiery dragon with ruby-red scales and a hoard of treasure beyond your wildest dreams.
A graceful dragon with a voice that can shake the mountains and calm the seas.
A mysterious dragon with an otherworldly aura that can manipulate sound and echoes.
secretNotes: Located at the top of the mountain of the rising sun

description: A dragon with shimmering scales that glow like the moon, breathing flames that can turn night into day.
A dragon with icy blue scales that can freeze anything in its path, but with a warm heart for those it trusts.
A dragon with stormy gray scales and the ability to control lightning, revered in both China and Brazil for her power over the skies.
secretNotes: Can be found in the eye of the storm

description: A dragon with shimmering green scales and the power to control nature, revered by the indigenous peoples of both Sweden and Peru.
secretNotes: Can be found in the heart of the Amazon rainforest

description: A dragon with iridescent purple scales and the ability to manipulate dreams, celebrated in both Ireland and India for her magical abilities.
secretNotes: Can be found in the misty hills of Connemara
